name: Chalet Hotel Steinbock

reviews.text: Just back from here after a recent stay of a few nights. Looks very nice from the outside, very traditional looking and right next door to a laundry facility. The rooms are a good size, but the sheets are not comfortable (nylon and bubbly), the pillow is a large soft big square thing that you have to fold over to resemble a traditional pillow.
reviews.title: Maybe try somewhere else

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Downstairs there is a very busy pizza restaurant, the wood burner keeps locals and visitors coming night after night. We tried a pizza and it was good, trouble was competing with all of the flies in the restaurant.
reviews.title: Fantastic Family-Run Hotel in the Heart of Grindelwald"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was very basic, the breakfast staff were abrupt and again you had to compete with the flies (I counted over 20 of them one morning).
reviews.title: There appears to be a mistake

description: The Chalet Hotel Steinbock is a beautiful wooden chalet, right in the centre of Grindelwald, just next to the first gondola (skiing area in winter, hiking paradise in the summer). The Steinbock was mentioned in books in 1700, but was completely rebuilt in 1991. It is famous for its restaurant - the most popular restaurant in town - with Italian and Swiss cuisine. The restaurant is famous for the huge steaks, the great pizzas, the excellent liver, to just name a few dishes.
